episodios.nome: Landing, Gourmet Island! The Gourmet Hunter Toriko Appears!
The Undiscovered Giant Beast! Toriko, Capture a Gararagator!
The Well Mellowed 7-Colored Fruit Juice! Pick the Rainbow Fruit!
Prepare It! The Poisonous Puffer Whale! The Heavenly King Coco Appears!
The Deadly Cave Battle! Fire, Five-Fold Spiked Punch!
The Knocking Master! Time to Taste the Puffer Whale!
The Strongest Wolf That Ever Lived! The Battle Wolf is Reborn!
The Threat Appears! Rumble at the Gourmet Coliseum!
That Which Is Passed Down! Activate, Gourmet Cells!
The Man Who Has an Invincible Domain! His Name Is Sunny!
Regal Isle Dash! Search for the Jewel Meat!
The Devils' Game! Clear the Devils' Playground!
The Ultimate Backup! Clash, Coco Vs. GT Robot!
The Threat Of Deadly Poison! Coco's Formula for Victory!
The Unyielding Aesthetic! Sunny's Manly Battle!
Rin's Final Wish! Awaken, Super Toriko!
Super Toriko, the Fists of Anger! This Is the Strongest Spike Punch!
The Taste Written in His DNA! Toriko, Search for the BB Corn!

metadata_completo.sinopse:
Hamburgers that grow out of the ground like four-leaf clovers, mountain ranges carved out of ice cream, and warm servings of mac and cheese that stew deep within the stomachs of volcanoes fill the landscape. This world of delectable natural wonders has reached a prime age of exploration—the Gourmet Age! Citizens and chefs alike aspire to taste and prepare the finest dishes, while adventurers called "Gourmet Hunters" seek out delicious rare ingredients.

Possessing a unique set of skills, the wild and passionate Gourmet Hunter Toriko is infamous for discovering 2% of all known ingredients. Together with his friend Komatsu—a highly skilled chef working at a five-star hotel—Toriko strives to complete his Full Course Menu of Life. But it isn’t going to be easy; in order to obtain the most delicious ingredients, Toriko must battle against obstacles like deadly monsters, evil organizations, and food itself!  

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
